name: Whac-a-Note!
description:
Welcome to Whac-a-Note! A fangame inspired by Kureiji Ollie"s loading screen! 

How to play:

Q, W, E for the upper three holes; B, N, M for the lower three.

up/down arrow key to switch song&theme, left/right arrow key to choose difficulty, press Enter to start.

If you find any bug, please email me: fengzhenyang47@gmail.com

Available on MacOS (recommended) and Windows, require java 1.8.0 or higher ver.

Sound source: 

Ollie neko sound: https://youtu.be/jGQM0JINH4Y 

Haachama sneeze & degenerate: https://www.myinstants.com/instant/akai-haato-degenelates-3465/?utm_source=copy&utm_medium=share https://www.myinstants.com/instant/haato-tskr-60316/?utm_source=copy&utm_medium=share 

Amelia noises: ;) 

Music source: https://youtu.be/YVzk3bqEu6g (Ollie bgm)

https://youtu.be/kKg-aXVS1YI (Ame bgm) 

https://youtu.be/H3KvMgoA1C4 (Haachamachama!)

If you're the artist who created the art and don't want me to display it in my game, please email fengzhenyang47@gmail.com, I'll remove it as soon as possible! This game is just made for fun and for non-profit use, and I don't want to get into any copyright issues.
